name: UpdateLandingPageFolder
description:
Update specific attributes of a landing page folder.

Use this tool to update specific attributes of a HubSpot CMS landing page folder, identified by its object ID. Only the column values that need modification should be specified.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the landing page folder to be updated.

parameters.name: deletion_timestamp_iso8601
parameters.description: The timestamp in ISO8601 format indicating when the content folder was deleted. Required for specifying deletion time.

value_schema.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this content folder was deleted.

parameters.name: parent_folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under. Specify this to set a new parent folder.

value_schema.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under

parameters.name: creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The creation timestamp of the folder in ISO8601 format. Used for reference only, typically not updated.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: Specify the new name of the landing page folder to display in the app dashboard.

value_schema.description: The name of the folder which will show up in the app dashboard

parameters.name: content_folder_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the landing page content folder to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique ID of the content folder.

parameters.name: folder_category
parameters.description: Specify the object type for the folder. Must be LANDING_PAGE.

value_schema.description: The type of object this folder applies to. Should always be LANDING_PAGE.

parameters.name: update_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the folder was last updated, in ISO8601 format. This indicates when changes were made.

parameters.name: update_deleted_folders
parameters.description: Set to true to update folders marked as deleted. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Folders. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: deletedAt
parameters.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this content folder was deleted.

value_schema.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this content folder was deleted.

parameters.name: parentFolderId
parameters.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under

value_schema.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the folder which will show up in the app dashboard

value_schema.description: The name of the folder which will show up in the app dashboard

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the content folder.

value_schema.description: The unique ID of the content folder.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The type of object this folder applies to. Should always be LANDING_PAGE.

value_schema.description: The type of object this folder applies to. Should always be LANDING_PAGE.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
